COLLABORATORS.NONE: You haven't invited any collaborators yet
COLLABORATORS.ROLE_CHANGE_ERROR: User role could not be changed. Please try again or contact us.
COLLABORATORS.ROLE_INFO:
User Roles:
  • ADMIN: Full system control, user & global settings management.
  • HQ: Strategic oversight, multi-team reporting & coordination.
  • FIELD: On-site operations, task execution, data collection.
  • SHARED: Access to common features & shared resources across specific user groups.

DASHBOARD.INFO:
Dashboard Overview:
From your Dashboard, you can access and monitor various operational areas. The widgets will provide a summary of related information if any on-going events or impacts have been detected within these areas. Click on an area to monitor it.

Area Types:
  • Private Areas: These are areas of operation specific to your organization or permissions. They are relevant to your direct activities and provide tailored information.
  • Public Areas: These are generally accessible to all users. They offer broader insights into public incidents or common operational zones.

SUBSCRIPTIONS.WIRE_TRANSFER: if you confirm you want to pay with wire-transfer, you will receive the bank details by email
SUBSCRIPTIONS.AREA_INFO_MESSAGE:
Area Type:
  • Emergency: Best suited for short-term, high-priority monitoring (e.g., natural disasters, ongoing incidents). Data is delivered quickly, but not stored for long.
  • Long-Term: Designed for continuous or periodic monitoring over time (e.g., environmental studies, infrastructure tracking). Data may arrive slower but is archived for future access.

Subscription Type:
  • 1 Location: Monitor a single area of operations.
  • 3 Location: Monitor up to 3 different areas of operations.
  • 5 Locations: Monitor up to five different areas simultaneously.
  • 10 Locations: Ideal for broader monitoring needs — track up to ten separate regions.
